message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll give you 40, and I'll take 60. It's a good starting point, don't you think?
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but it's still a good deal. You can't get it all, after all!
I appreciate the offer, but I was hoping for a bit more. I'll try to do better next time.
I'm willing to compromise. I'll take 56, and you can have 44. It's a fair split, considering the value of the money is decreasing.
